GSD.description:
drm/plane: Move range check for format_count earlier

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.14 by commit 787163d19bc3cdc6ca4b96223f62208534d1cf6b. For more details please see the references link.
